name: Hirudine Stalker
movement: walk 30 ft., climb 20 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: A medium-sized monstrosity that excels in aquatic environments, with advantages in climbing and swimming. It uses its unique adaptations and stealth to stalk and ambush prey.
memorable: The Hirudine Stalker can regain health through its necrotic attacks and has devastating projectile abilities, making it a fearsome opponent in battle.
goals: To hunt and ambush weakened foes.
relations: Often encountered with other Hirudine Stalkers, forming packs to enhance their hunting strategies.
environment: Typically found in damp, aquatic areas such as swamps or riverbanks.
strengths: Excels in tracking injured foes and can ambush with debilitating attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to psychic damage, taking double damage from such attacks.
attacks: Uses Bite and Spit Tooth attacks, the latter inflicting debilitating effects or causing incapacitation.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Scent grants advantage on checks to locate injured prey, enhancing its stalking abilities.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Has a +2 modifier in Perception, enabling it to track and hunt effectively.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious nature.
Regains hit points equal to necrotic damage dealt through its Bite attack.
Has versatile projectile attacks with varying debilitating effects.
Possesses telepathy with other Hirudine Stalkers over 120 feet.
test_queries: stealthy underwater predator with debilitating attacks
ambush predator that regains health when it bites
versatile monster in swamps that can breathe water
creature that tracks injured foes in combat
medium monstrosity with blindsight and telepathy
